version_description: IMPORTANT - Updated to use new USGS versioned data feeds.
IMPORTANT - Updated to use new USGS versioned data feeds.

-> Flat UI design
-> Search box on Quake List
-> New USGS Data Feed: 30-day Significant Earthquakes
-> FAQ and Earthquake Preparedness info
-> Bug fixes
-> Latest version of Esri mapping SDK

-> Flat UI design
-> Search box on Quake List
-> New USGS Data Feed: 30-day Significant Earthquakes
-> FAQ and Earthquake Preparedness info
-> Bug fixes
-> Latest version of Esri mapping SDK

- iOS 8 compatibility
- Show potential tsunami info for affected quakes
- Link to NOAA Tsunami Warning Center for affected quakes
- Under the hood bug fixes and improvements

- iOS 8 compatibility
- Show potential tsunami info for affected quakes
- Link to NOAA Tsunami Warning Center for affected quakes
- Under the hood bug fixes and improvements

Push Notification Improvements
- New Configuration Screen
- Toggle Free Notifications On/Off
- Optional Monthly Test Notifications
- Optional Product Announcements
- Increment Badge on App Icon
- Bug Fixes and Improvements

Filtering Earthquakes
- You can now filter by distance and magnitude

Local Tips and Information
- QuakeFeed is partnering with local merchants to bring you tips and information when you open the app while in a participating venue. You can opt out, please see the Privacy FAQ for details.

Push Notification Improvements
- New Configuration Screen
- Toggle Free Notifications On/Off
- Optional Monthly Test Notifications
- Optional Product Announcements
- Increment Badge on App Icon
- Bug Fixes and Improvements

Filtering Earthquakes
- You can now filter by distance and magnitude

Local Tips and Information
- QuakeFeed is partnering with local merchants to bring you tips and information when you open the app while in a participating venue. You can opt out, please see the Privacy FAQ for details.

- Optimized for iPhone 6 and 6 plus
- New notification sound
- Alerts now show distance in miles as well as kilometers
- Easier to view and edit location settings
- Easier to view and edit notification settings

Do you like QuakeFeed? Please consider rating and writing a review on the App Store. Positive reviews improve our ranking and help new users learn about QuakeFeed. Apple resets the the review count to 0 after every update, so reviews right after an update are the most important. Thank you!

Note that we cannot respond to reviews on the App Store. If you have feedback or a question that requires a response, tap the Email Support button on the Settings view or email us at support@artisanglobal.com. We will get back to you!

- Fix crash on iOS 7
- Migration to new backend services
- USGS "Did You Feel It?" integration
- Custom alerts down to magnitude 1.0
- Swipe to view an earthquake from Push Notification (iPhone only)
- Simplify data feed selection
- Note: Use the Filters view to set the minimum magnitude down to 1.0
- Bug fixes and improvements

- Fix crash on iOS 7
- Migration to new backend services
- USGS "Did You Feel It?" integration
- Custom alerts down to magnitude 1.0

- Nearby Alerts for earthquakes near your location - free for everyone
- Regional Alerts (previously called Custom Notifications) are now free for all users
- More alert sound options for notifications - free for everyone
- Switching to ad-supported model to make these great new features available to everyone for free
- Users who previously purchased Custom Notifications will never see ads
- Remove ads with a QuakeFeed Premium annual subscription
- Bug fixes and improvements

What's New in version 4.0.1:
- Shop for emergency supplies
- Fixed bug, the Add Regional Alert button was not being shown after deleting all alerts
- Fixed a couple of bugs when restoring previous In App Purchases
- Fixed an iPad bug, after upgrading, ads were not removed until the app was restarted

Prepare to be delighted!
- Stunning new basemaps
- Redesigned UI
- Dark Mode support
- MMI Contours map layer
- Erupting Volcanoes map layer

It's QuakeFeed's 10th Anniversary!
A deep and humble THANK YOU to our
community of earth science geeks!

We're excited to launch v5.0, it's our
gift to you and we hope you love it.
We put a ton of work and late nights into
this update in the middle of a pandemic, 
while homeschooling... what a year!

If you find any bugs, issues, concerns... 
If you have a question or a suggestion...
Please write to us, let us know!

Use the Support Center in QuakeFeed 
or email us at support@artisanglobal.com

It's QuakeFeed's 10th Anniversary!
A deep and humble THANK YOU to our
community of earth science geeks!

We're excited to launch v5.0, it's our
gift to you and we hope you love it.
We put a ton of work and late nights into
this update in the middle of a pandemic, 
while homeschooling... what a year!

If you find any bugs, issues, concerns... 
If you have a question or a suggestion...
Please write to us, let us know!

Use the Support Center in QuakeFeed 
or email us at support@artisanglobal.com

You spoke, we listened!
- More dark / light mode options
- More readable marker symbols
- Colored plate lines
- Offset labels on plate lines
- Improved labeling on volcanoes
- Cancel button when searching Quake List
- Show Loading… in Quake List header
- Added 1600 mi / km distance filter
- Translucent map toolbar
- Re-ordered basemaps
- Bug Fixes: 
----Tapping on alert doesn’t show earthquake
----Hide keyboard when selecting a quake
----Random crash when changing base map
----Swipe to delete regional alert
----Issue saving alert settings

If you find any bugs, issues, concerns...
If you have a question or a suggestion...
Please write to us, let us know!

Use the Support Center in QuakeFeed
or email us at support@artisanglobal.com
